name: Red Heart
baseMeaning: A classic red heart symbol representing love and affection.
tldr: The classic love emoji - used for romantic love, deep affection, or strong appreciation.

contextMeanings.meaning: Expressing love or strong affection for someone or something.
Romantic interest or love for a partner.
Strong appreciation or enthusiasm for something.
Can feel too personal in professional contexts.

platformNotes.note: The default heart when double-tapping to like. Very common in comments.
Carries more weight than other platforms - implies genuine affection.
Use sparingly in work contexts - may seem unprofessional or overly familiar.

generationalNotes.note: Often prefer other heart colors - red heart is seen as more serious/romantic.
Use freely for both romantic and platonic love.
The go-to heart emoji, used broadly for any positive sentiment.

warnings.title: Context matters
warnings.description: Red heart implies deeper affection than other heart colors - use other colors for casual appreciation.

seoTitle: ❤️ Red Heart Emoji Meaning - What Does ❤️ Really Mean?
seoDescription: Learn what the red heart emoji ❤️ really means in modern texting. The classic love symbol for romantic and deep affection. Complete context guide.
